title: Bristol: British city
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, Alexander Shaw and Mary Francis
brief_description: The people of Bristol tell of their city, long since called the Maritime Capital of the West of England; a city with whose history many pioneers, adventurers and navigators, and many great moral and spiritual leaders have been associated. With its bustling life and half a million citizens, the city’s efficiency is still symbolised by the old phrase “shipshape and Bristol fashion”.
